channel.title: Vmug on Interrupt Request
channel.description: Recent content in Vmug on Interrupt Request

item.title: South Carolina VMUGs and Modern Data Centers
item.author: interruptrequestio@gmail.com (Wes Carroll)
item.description: This past week, I had the amazing opportunity to speak at two different VMUG events. The first group I got to speak with was the Columbia, SC VMUG and the second was with the Hilton Head / Bluffton, SC VMUG group. Both of these events had some very smart people in the room which led to quite interesting conversations.
